description:
The A-TEC class is working hard for their in-house presentation. After the seminar, Angelina and Iris get caught up in their fancy dinner. Have they forgotten that they have a flight to catch?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hattori Hanako no Ichiban Nagai Hi
Le jour le plus long pour Hattori Hanako
服部花子のいちばん長い日
